https://tmrev.io/movie/702170-A Darker Shade of Gray 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Detective Milton Gray is tormented by his past and has no faith in his future. Once a respected officer of the law, he is now a guilt-ridden, pill-popping addict; a fallen sentinel. He is a man who wants desperately to do the right thing, but has no idea what that is. A Darker Shade of Gray
